description: Try our easy to follow Mild Chicken Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Curry,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Rice,Chicken,Slow cooker,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mild Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt McCormick Slow Cookers Mild Chicken Curry Recipe Base

recipeInstructions.text: Heat vegetable oil in frying pan over MED-HIGH heat. Brown chicken and onion then add into slow cooker insert pot with potatoes.
Mix McCormick Slow Cookers Mild Chicken Curry Recipe Base with coconut milk and pour over chicken and vegetables, stir through.
Cover and cook for 2 hours on HIGH or 4 hours on LOW (Keep covered during cooking. Cooking times may vary between slow cooker models).
Add fresh coriander and serve with your choice of suggested sides.
